text: Maa Pallelo Gopaludu is a 1985 Telugu film directed by Kodi Ramakrishna. The film starred Arjun and Poornima in the lead roles. The film was commercially successful and ran for 367 days. This film marked the Telugu debut of Arjun. ==Cast== * Arjun as Gopalam * Poornima * Raja * Gollapudi * Chandrika * Vijaya * Kalpana Rai * P. J. Sharma * Chidatala Apparao * Baby Saraswathi * Varalakshmi * Ali (child artist) == Soundtrack == Soundtrack was composed by K. V. Mahadevan.https://gaana.com/album/mappalelo-gopaladu *Rani Ranamma - SPB, P. Susheela *Sariga Sariga - SPB *Ko Ko Kothi - SPB *Nenu Ele -SPB *Kum Kummanthine - SPB ==References== ==External links== * Category:Films directed by Kodi Ramakrishna Category:Telugu film scores by K. title: Maa Pallelo Gopaludu
